bike.description: S-Works Tricross FACT 10m carbon, Az1 construction, semi-compact design, Zertz inserts, OS BB, rack and fender fittings

components.description: S-Works Tricross fork, full FACT carbon monocoque w/ SpeedZertz, rack and fender fittings
Aheadset Stainless Race/top cap w/ 20mm of spacers
S-Works 3D forged with carbon-wrap top and front cap
Silver cage/black body, w/ black toe clips and strap
Specialized Houffalize Pro, 700x32c, aramid bead, 120TPI, Dual Compound

Body Geometry Phenom Team, w/ hollow Cr-Mo rails
S-Works FACT carbon w/ Zertz insert, 27.2mm
